main event: A UFO was sighted by the crew of a C-45 aircraft near Norton AFB, California on October 30, 1953.
interesting points: The object passed directly below the aircraft and continued across the sky, climbing rapidly until it disappeared from view.
The object was described as bright red on the leading portion and bright white on the trailing portion, with no discernible features due to the glare of the light.
The object did not have any visible exhaust or trail, and made no audible sound.
The object appeared to resemble flak and was observed for a total of 7 minutes.
The sighting was made by a crew of three, including the pilot, co-pilot, and observer, who were considered to be very reliable observers.
sighted object: A bright red and white object that passed below the aircraft and climbed rapidly out of sight
witnesses: Pilot, co-pilot, and observer of a C-45 aircraft
